Package Configuration

Objects, Scripts and Properties
Command ng_init Inits the NativeGeometry library by setting all local variables to the current environment.
Command ng_SetConfig Sets the value of the NativeGeometry configuration property pProperty to pValue.
Function ng_GetConfig() Returns the value of the NativeGeometry configuration property pProperty.
